mapper.sql: id, delivery_order_id, product_id, product_num, depot_id, sale_unit_price, sale_money
mapper.select: select a.id, a.delivery_order_id, a.product_id, b.product_name, a.product_num, b.product_spec, a.depot_id, a.sale_unit_price, a.sale_money from sale_delivery_details a INNER JOIN base_product b on a.product_id=b.product_number where delivery_id = #{deliveryId}
mapper.insert:
insert into sale_delivery_details
delivery_order_id,
product_id,
product_num,
depot_id,
sale_unit_price,
sale_money,
#{deliveryOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{productNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{depotId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{saleUnitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{saleMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

insert into sale_delivery_details(delivery_order_id, product_id, product_num, depot_id, sale_unit_price, sale_money) values
(#{entity.deliveryOrderId}, #{entity.productId}, #{entity.productNum}, #{entity.depotId}, #{entity.saleUnitPrice}, #{entity.saleMoney})
mapper.update:
update sale_delivery_details
delivery_order_id = #{deliveryOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_num = #{productNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
depot_id = #{depotId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sale_unit_price = #{saleUnitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
sale_money = #{saleMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sale_delivery_details set delivery_order_id = #{deliveryOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_num = #{productNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, depot_id = #{depotId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sale_unit_price = #{saleUnitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sale_money = #{saleMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
